EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data Science Tech Workshops_Q3-416.Confirmation - Worldline
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed for Data Science Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up for the Pivotal Data Science hands-on technical workshop dedicated to your organization. Please find more details on this event below.
Date & Location Friday, 28 October 2016 14h00 to 18h00
Worldline River Ouest 80 Quai Voltaire 95870 Bezons
{{my.Save the Date Worldline}}
Prerequisites
- Willingness to participate in demanding, high-intensity training experience - Comfort with data analytic technologies a plus (Statistics, mathematics, machine learning, SQL, R, Python)
Intended Audience
- Experienced data analysts and data engineers willing to work hard to achieve superior Pivotal Data Science skills - Anyone else who wants to learn about data science using the Pivotal Big Data product stack
Prepare your system for the workshop
If you are planning to follow the workshop labs, you will need to have a client ssh program installed. There are several open source / free programs available:
- Windows: Putty <[[http://www.putty.org/]]> or MobaXterm <[[http://mobaxterm.mobatek.net/download.html]]> (MobaXterm is preferred) - MacOS: Native built in - Linux: Native built in
You are also welcome to use any commercial version if you have it.
Questions? If you have any questions related to the workshop, please contact Marie-Jeanne Dougados at mdougados@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mdougados@pivotal.io]]>.
Kind Regards, The Pivotal Team
For a preview of our data science stories, check out the Pivotal Data Science blog: http://blog.pivotal.io/data-science-pivotal <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/data-science-pivotal]]>.
